snippet.title: Slippery Flippers: Episode One: Amulet of the Gods Trailer
snippet.description:
Slippery Flippers: Episode One - Amulet of the Gods is a comedy visual novel about a group of thieves taking on their biggest heist yet: stealing the Amulet of the Gods.

"Orlando and his crew are looking for their next gig, and the museum is a prime target with their priceless relics on display. Not to mention this mysterious "Amulet of the Gods" with unknown godlike power is sitting there, waiting to be stolen.

Can this crew of misfits outwit Riggs and Luca, the local law enforcement, and steal the Amulet of the Gods?

Play Slippery Flippers: Episode One -Amulet of the Gods and see if Orlando can lead his crew to riches or ruin!"

Wishlist Slippery Flippers: Episode One - Amulet of the Gods on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2265650/Slippery_Flippers_Episode_One__Amulet_of_the_Gods/

Follow Snowhaven Studios on Twitter: https://twitter.com/SnowhavenStudio
Follow us on Tumblr: https://www.tumblr.com/snowhavenstudios
Check out our other games: https://snowhavenstudios.com/

"Rollin at 5' by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/)

"Jewel Thieves" by Eric Matyas (www.soundimage.org)

Sound effects obtained by Zapslpat (https://www.zapsplat.com)
